beach-shop.closed: Sorry, we're closed. We are open from 10 am to 6 pm every day.
ice-cream-shop.dialogue: Welcome to the Ice Cream Shop!
ice-cream-shop.closed: Sorry. I'm not selling ice cream right now. Come back between 9 am to 7 pm!
submarine-shop.closed: Sorry, the shop is not open yet. I'm usually open from 10 am to 9 pm.
